mapper.select: SELECT id, name, asset FROM account WHERE user_id = #{id}
SELECT count(id) FROM account WHERE name = #{name} and user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account(name, asset, user_id) VALUES(#{name}, #{asset}, #{user_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE account SET name = #{name}, asset = #{asset} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE account SET asset = asset + #{cost} WHERE id = #{account_id}
UPDATE account SET asset = asset - #{cost} WHERE id = #{account_id}
